TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListItemControlBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder

summary.span: Interacts with the parser to build a control.

span.span: Interacts with the parser to build a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Essa classe é usada principalmente para os desenvolvedores de controle.This class is used primarily for control developers. Para criar um construtor de controle personalizado para um derivado de controle, você precisa herdar dessa classe.To create a custom control builder for a derived control, you need to inherit from this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool AllowWhitespaceLiterals() cil managed
Public Overrides Function AllowWhitespaceLiterals () As Boolean

summary.span: Determines whether white spaces in the text associated with the are represented by objects.

span.span: Determines whether white spaces in the text associated with the are represented by objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse método substitui a implementação herdada do método sempre indicam que espaços em branco no texto associado a controle não são representados por objetos.This method overrides the inherited implementation of the method to always indicate that white spaces in the text associated with the control are not represented by objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool HtmlDecodeLiterals() cil managed
Public Overrides Function HtmlDecodeLiterals () As Boolean

summary.span: Determines whether HTML entities in the text associated with the are converted to their equivalent characters when the text is parsed.

span.span: Determines whether HTML entities in the text associated with the are converted to their equivalent characters when the text is parsed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O método é usado para determinar se as entidades HTML do texto associado a são convertidos em seus equivalentes caracteres quando o texto é analisado.The method is used to determine whether HTML entities in the text associated with the are converted to their equivalent characters when the text is parsed. Esse método substitui a implementação herdada do método sempre retornará `true`.This method overrides the inherited implementation of the method to always return `true`. Isso indica que entidades HTML no texto associado a controle sempre automaticamente são convertidos em seus equivalentes, caracteres de texto sem formatação.This indicates that HTML entities in the text associated with the control are always automatically converted to their equivalent, plain text characters. > [!NOTE] > O texto associado a é renderizado como um atributo do `The text associated with the is rendered as an attribute of the ` Quando o atributo é renderizado no cliente, caracteres especiais são automaticamente convertidos para suas entidades HTML equivalente.When the attribute is rendered on the client, special characters are automatically converted to their equivalent HTML entity. Por exemplo, o menor que (<) de caractere é convertido em `<`.For example, the less than character (<) is converted to `<`. Quando o atributo é analisado, entidades HTML são automaticamente convertidas para seus equivalentes, caracteres de texto sem formatação.When the attribute is parsed, HTML entities are automatically converted back to their equivalent, plain text characters.
